version_description:
- Fixed turn indicators for Jerez and Losail circuits
- Fixed DTales Account synch issue
- Added animations to rider's hands in cockpit view

Minor bug fixes.

- Improved support for mobile game controllers and fine-tuned control sensitivity
- Reduced video ads (no more ads displayed on launching the game)

- The app was brought back to its original file size (from 590 MB to 324 MB).

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Third-party SDKs updated to comply with the EU GDPR

- New helmet camera diving you into the high-octane Superbike racing action
- Animated dashboard for an even more realistic riding experience
- Audio bugs affecting engine sounds have been fixed
- Antialiasing added to improve the graphics quality
